text: I am Mahesh, a 3rd year undergraduate from IIIT Nagpur. I want to start contribution to Julia org. Recently I just contributed in hactoberfest 2020 and really wanna do more. Please help or guide me in doing so.

elements.text: I am Mahesh, a 3rd year undergraduate from IIIT Nagpur. I want to start contribution to Julia org. Recently I just contributed in hactoberfest 2020 and really wanna do more. Please help or guide me in doing so.

text: any specific areas you want to contribute in?

elements.text: any specific areas you want to contribute in?

text: my best recommendation would be to check for issues (ideally those marked good first issue) if you want to contribute to Base. If you want to create new modules, look for gaps in what packages provide and write your own.

elements.text: my best recommendation would be to check for issues (ideally those marked good first issue) if you want to contribute to Base. If you want to create new modules, look for gaps in what packages provide and write your own.

text: Ok I am going through the GitHub source code. I really Appreciate that you replied and helped me. Thank you so much. For future guidance I will again come to you asking for help.
